WRITING.TITLE: 808 mixing help!
WRITING.TEXT: Can someone please give me a detailed guide on mixing 808s so as to make them fit tighter in a mix? For genres like trap, future bass. Help appreciated!

WRITING.TITLE: Skrillex and What so Not type digital distortion.
WRITING.TEXT: [removed]
Pull up your old finished projects. Mix them from scratch again.

Layering does the job. 2 layers of bass to fill the spectrum and according to the sound you want. A well EQed sub layered with them gives that solid bassline. Using the right notes to build tension in the bass does wonders.
I tried doing that today. It really made a difference. Thanks mate! Cheers!
I've never used a lot of Visualizers. Maybe time to use some. Thanks mate. Cheers!
Sidechaining slightly would create more room. Sure. Thanks for the tips. Really helpful. Cheers!
Panning the synths to make room.. That would certainly help. Thanks for the tips.
